item.title: 3 Questions!
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

ok ur 1st one works for all playerrights sept for 0…

anyway bout ur question

in dodian servers theres duel dupes…i wont metion them because of dupers but they envolve opening interfaces like ::players during a duel and receiving the staked item for both players…so i was wondering if there was a way to make it so no interfaces could be open whle dueling so you cant do ::players in a duel or cant use the bank in a duel…

btw mor ehelp needed on worldshop[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2007, 07:48:03 AM[/size][hr]anymore help would be appreciated plz?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2007, 08:07:43 AM[/size][hr]Please?

^
2 errors

item.title: 3 Questions!
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Hey Guys,
Im Using Devolution Server 7.0 And i Was Wondering…

  1. How To Stop All Interfaces Coming Up During Duel And Trade Without Deleteing Them Altogether.etc. ::players, bank, report abuse.

  2. Ive Just Spawned Some New Npcs In Npc.cfg And Now All My Npcs Hit 0 No Matter What Stats I Set Them To.

  3. A Little Command Help With Making ::players Admin Only and also My ::worldshop Command Only Works For Admins, How Do I Make It Work For Everyone.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“worldshop”)) {
openUpShop(22);
}

If You Could Help Me With ANY Of These It Would Be Appreciated

Read full topic
